languages.text: "Твои слова согревают душу". {n}Эльдарка кивает и ненадолго погружается в свои мысли.{/n} "Что ж, я пойду. Не забудь о данном обещании".
"Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."
languages.original_text: "Твои слова согревают душу". {n}Эльдарка кивает и ненадолго погружается в свои мысли.{/n} "Что ж, я пойду. Не забудь о данном обещании".

traits.locale_text: "Your wards warm my soul." {n}The Aeldari nods and briefly drifts off into thoughts.{/n} "Well, I'll take my leave. Don't forget about your promise."
"Your wards warm my soul." {n}The Aeldari nods and briefly drifts off into thoughts.{/n} "Well, I'll take my leave. Don't forget about your promise."
"Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."
"Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."
"Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

languages.text: “你的话语温暖了我的灵魂。”{n}伊莉耶特点了点头，短暂地陷入了思考。{/n}“很好，那我走了，别忘了你说的话。”
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语温暖了我的灵魂。”{n}伊莉耶特点了点头，短暂地陷入了思考。{/n}“很好，那我走了，别忘了你说的话。”

languages.text: «Tus palabras insuflan calidez en mi alma». {n}Yrliet asiente y durante un instante parece sumida en sus pensamientos.{/n} «Bien, ahora me marcho. No olvides tu promesa».
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: «Tus palabras insuflan calidez en mi alma». {n}Yrliet asiente y durante un instante parece sumida en sus pensamientos.{/n} «Bien, ahora me marcho. No olvides tu promesa».

languages.text: « Vos paroles réchauffent mon âme. » {n}Yrliet hoche la tête et se perd un instant dans ses pensées.{/n} « Je vais m'en aller, à présent. N'oubliez pas votre promesse. »
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles réchauffent mon âme. » {n}Yrliet hoche la tête et se perd un instant dans ses pensées.{/n} « Je vais m'en aller, à présent. N'oubliez pas votre promesse. »

languages.text: "Eure Worte wärmen meine Seele." {n}Yrliet nickt und wirkt kurzzeitig gedankenverloren.{/n} "Gut, ich gehe jetzt. Vergesst Euer Versprechen nicht."
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte wärmen meine Seele." {n}Yrliet nickt und wirkt kurzzeitig gedankenverloren.{/n} "Gut, ich gehe jetzt. Vergesst Euer Versprechen nicht."

languages.text: 「お前の言葉は魂を温めてくれるようだ」{n}ユリエットはうなずき、しばし物思いにふける。{/n}「いいだろう、我はこれで失礼する。約束を忘れるなよ」
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉は魂を温めてくれるようだ」{n}ユリエットはうなずき、しばし物思いにふける。{/n}「いいだろう、我はこれで失礼する。約束を忘れるなよ」

languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

languages.text: "Sözlerin ruhumu ısıtıyor." {n}Yrliet, başını sallayarak bir anlığına düşüncelerinde kayboluyor.{/n} "Ben artık gideyim. Sen de verdiğin sözü unutma."
languages.original_text: "Your words warm my soul." {n}Yrliet nods and is briefly lost in thought.{/n} "Very well, I will leave now. Do not forget your promise."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerin ruhumu ısıtıyor." {n}Yrliet başını sallayarak bir anlığına düşüncelerinde kayboluyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ, gitme vaktim geldi. Verdiğin sözü unutma."
